item.description:
WEDNESDAY MAY 18, 2011

7:30 A.M.-8:30 A.M.

MERRIMACK VALLEY GOLF CLUB

AUROA ROOM – 2ND FLOOR

 

 

 Come see for yourself how you can take advantage of what Warren Buffet sees as the greatest transfer of wealth in US. History!

 

Come meet one of the top 10 global business leaders of an international, billion dollar company! , She has been featured on the Celebrity Apprentice last month and recently written up in a National Business Magazine. She has been asked to speak in front of 25,000 people at events across the country and she has graciously agreed to present this opportunity to those people interested in improving the quality of their lives by putting more time and money back into our lives.

 Learn how to:

 1)      Earn additional monthly income effective immediately and long-term income with unlimited earnings potential.

2)      Work part-time at your own pace and eventually full-time if you choose.

3)      Capitalize on the greatest shift in wealth this country has ever experienced with the de-regulation of gas and electricity.

 

You don’t want to miss out!  This is like NOTHING you have ever seen before and this is happening with or without us. Most people miss opportunities….don’t let that be you.

 

 

RSVP- Maryellen Duchesne 603-490-4371 or maryellend143@gmail.com

            Limited Seating, first come first serve
item.why: If you want to meet someone who can show you a unique situation, something like you have never seen before, involving something that Warren Buffet says it will be the greatest transfer of wealth in US History, some see for yourself.

group.name: The Boston Millionaire Total Empowerment Meetup Group

item.name: Come Meet a Top Global Leader from a billion $ company
